title: Sewa suki de Kawaii JK 3-Shimai dattara, Ouchi de Amaetemo ii desu ka? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Romance   School Life
tags: Cohabitation   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Salaryman   Younger Love Interests
author: Hamubane   はむばね
description: Haruki Hitomi, a 27-year-old corporate slave, heavily intoxicated, meets three cute but distinctive sisters who have run away from home. The girl in front of Haruki is the eldest, Iori Kozakura, a strong-willed girl with a tendency to lose her temper. The second daughter, Roka Kozakura, who is constantly annoying and (self-proclaimed) great at teasing. And the third daughter, Hakua Kozakura, who tries to act like mature but ends up behaving like a child despite her age. As their cohabitation begins rather haphazardly, Haruki finds himself working less overtime and improving his dietary habits. His gray everyday life gets more colorful -- A love comedy of an ticklish everyday life.>
